# Cost Comparison Tool

A basic interface for comparing the monthly and yearly pricing of things like SaaS options.

## Usage

1. Find the tool [here](https://ty-r.github.io/cost-calc/)
2. Configure unit, quantity, and any discount
3. Populate the table with tools, tiers, and base prices

For example, unit may be users, minutes, vCPUs -- any scaling factor. Quantity controls the amount of units.

All data is encoded in the URL, so it can be freely shared with anyone and everything will be preserved. See [this example](https://ty-r.github.io/cost-calc?) for a populated table.
